name: NSTextBlock.Dimension
desc: The following constants specify values used by the methods setValue(_:type:for:), value(for:), and valueType(for:) to specify text block dimensions.

items.name: case minimumWidth
items.desc: Minimum width of the text block.

items.name: case maximumWidth
items.desc: Maximum width of the text block.

items.name: case minimumHeight
items.desc: Minimum height of the text block.

items.name: case maximumHeight
items.desc: Maximum height of the text block.
